text: læa khea klaw wa xo luk xey phwk cea xya khea meuxng thang deiywkan tæ phwk cea cng khea meuxng tang thang kan læa chan mi xac hı khwam khumkan phwk cea ca kxallxhˌ di kar tadsin pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ chan khxm xb kar wicı dæ phraxngkh læa khx hı brrda phu mxb kar wi wangcı cng wicı dæ phraxngkh
